pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Live Colour Pastels Cotton Candy Pink
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Schwarzkopf Live Colour Pastels by Ultra Brights Cotton Candy Pink semi-permanent colour creates stunning pastel tones in 2 minutes, a glossy vivid shine, contains no ammonia and is good for 8 washes.

Re-create the latest trend and achieve stunning pastel tones with Schwarzkopf Live Colour Pastels by Ultra Brights. Get the perfect pastel dip-dye, highlights or all over colour. 

The ready to use formula requires no pre-mixing and works in just 2 minutes! 

Change your hair colour as often as you like with Schwarzkopf Live Colour Pastels by Ultra Brights! 

Gentle Conditioning Colour:

- Enriched with a colour mask that adds superior condition and shine.

- Gentle formula contains no peroxide or ammonia.

- Will not lighten hair.

- Lasts up to 6 to 8 washes.

Cotton Candy Pink Pastels by Ultra brights semi-permanent colour adds condition and vivid shine for beautiful, soft pastel pink colour results!

Suitable For: Dip-dye, highlights or all over colour.

Boxed Contents: 30mL sachet of colour, instruction leaflet, gloves.

Size: 1 Pack

Hair Colour: Cotton Candy Pink

Warnings

This product contains ingredients which may cause skin irritation to certain individuals. A preliminary test according to the accompanying directions should be made before use. This product must not be used for dyeing eyelashes or eyebrows; to do so may be injurious to the eye.

CAUTION

Keep out of reach of children.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Cotton candy pink is recommended on pre-lightened and very light blonde hair.

FIRST AID INFORMATION

For advice, contact a Poisons Information Centre (Phone Australia 13 11 26; New Zealand 0800 764 766) or a doctor. If in eyes, wash out immediately with water.

Ingredients

Colour Cream: Aqua (Water), Cetearyl Alcohol, Coconut Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Disodium Cocoamphodipropionate, Methylparaben, Parfum, Basic Red 51, Polyquaternium-6, Propylparaben, Ethanolamine, Etidronic Acid.

Directions

Quick & Easy to Apply: Shampoo and towel dry hair. Apply colour and leave on for 2 to 15 minutes. Rinse thoroughly and style as usual.We recommend using two packs or more if your hair is longer than chin length. One Application: Instruction leaflet & gloves enclosed. Directions for use: See package insert.

USAGE ADVICE

Gentle Conditioning Colour:
- Enriched with colour mask that adds superior condition and shine.
- Gentle formula contains no peroxide or ammonia.
- Will not lighten hair.
- Lasts up to 6 to 8 washes.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
